name: Chess Royale: Play Board Game
description:
~Chess Royale is a classic online board chess game that allows you to play your favorite game online at any time for free, with no restrictions with players from around the world!~

• Chess Royale is suitable for players of any level from beginner to pro. Develop tactics, strategy, memory and logic using one of 5 online chess modes:

• Chess with friends. Play chess with friends, participate in chess tournaments together. Receive notifications as soon as your friend is online, so as not to miss an exciting game

• Chess blitz. Participate in a fast chess game with a random player from anywhere in the world. You are given only one minute to win! Think fast, develop a strategy.

• Time attack. Use your tactics to finish the match in 5 minutes. Be faster than the opponent. The one who has more chess on the board after the time expires wins.

• Chess against the computer. Can you beat artificial intelligence in today's game? Analyze and evaluate the position of the enemy before he defeats you.

• Daily puzzles. Participate and study in daily chess battles, get cups, get into leagues and become a great chess grandmaster.


Learn chess with our application: the game has tips for each chess piece, memorize them and quickly checkmate your opponents.

- Features:

• Dozens of types of visual themes for boards and figures.
• Personal statistics and player achievements.
• Player leaderboard by country statistics.
• Chess tournaments.
• VIP chess.
